thread.title: Jigar

author: Jigar
title: Jigar
text: It was wonderful experience I have no time to go collage but at work in free time I follow Level 2 Certificate in Book keeping/Accounting course from e - Careers and it was nice step by step learning guide and easy to learn languagge as well I spend nearly 55 hours behind reading instruction and I done the progress test as well which gave me confidence thanks to E-careers to ful fill my demand.
